sentence: It was both impressive and heart-warming to see that U.S. Sen. Mark Kelly (D-Arizona) sent his representative to the Kingman Women Making History program to award each honoree with a Congressional Certificate.
title: Rants and Raves | March 9, 2022

sentence: The Complex AIR FORCE READY TO SEND F-16 FIGHTERS TO POLAND: Air Combat Command chief Gen. title: Poland gets its close-up

sentence: And it came after Sen. Mark Kelly, D-Ariz., earlier Wednesday said Biden “absolutely” should call Putin a war criminal.

sentence: Eight Senate Dems — including several up for reelection this fall — voted with the GOP: MICHAEL BENNET (Colo.), CATHERINE CORTEZ MASTO (Nev.), MAGGIE HASSAN (N.H.), MARK KELLY (Ariz.), JOE MANCHIN (W.Va.), JACKY ROSEN (Nev.), Sinema and JON TESTER (Mont.).
title: POLITICO Playbook: What Zelenskyy wants vs. what he'll get

sentence: WASHINGTON (Sputnik) - A group of US lawmakers will travel to Germany, Poland, India, and the United Arab Emirates (UAE) to try to secure stronger support for... 18.04.2022, Sputnik International https://cdnn1.img.sputniknews.com/img/07e5/0b/1e/1091155623_0:0:3073:1728_1920x0_80_0_0_cb53c02e02c3fb7715ece47413485b1d.jpg.webp The Congressional lawmakers will include US Senators Mark Kelly, Kirsten Gillibrand, Cory Booker, and Ed Markey, as well as House of Representatives member Mondaire Jones.The delegation’s upcoming nine-day trip was announced by Kelly in an e-mail to the newspaper on Sunday evening.According to The Hill, Germany, Poland, India, and the UAE have not been active enough in cooperating with US-led efforts to isolate Russia.Russia launched its special military operation in Ukraine on February 24, after the Donetsk and Lugansk People’s Republics (DPR and LPR) appealed for help in defending themselves against Ukrainian provocations.
title: US Congress Members to Visit Germany, UAE, Hoping to Get More Support For Kiev - Reports

author: Marcus E. Howard
title: Sen. Ed Markey calls on the U.S. to lift the cap on Ukrainian refugees
